system.requirements:
Tier 3; BS 50, The Bigger They Are 
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Finesse
system.effect:
When firing at a target with a Size Trait larger than the character's own, character adds the difference in Size Trait to their Damage.
EG: A Ratling (Size 3, Scrawny) does +2 damage vs an Ork Nob (Size 5, Hulking)
